title: Bubble, Selection & Insertion Sort
subject: Data Structures
theory:
Elementary algorithms.
- **Bubble**: Float largest to top. O(n^2).
- **Selection**: Find min, swap. O(n^2).
- **Insertion**: Insert into sorted subarray. O(n^2).

examples.code: Insertion Sort is fast for small n or nearly sorted data.

summary: Good for education, bad for production.
